sections.general:
SR. BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER
Professional Summary
Highly organized sales professional with 12 years of inside and outside sales. Exceptional Outside Sales Representative who consistently achieves
annual sales quotas and increases the overall customer base in several fields including telecom, advertising, and software solutions. Effectively
grows brand awareness through increased market penetration and new market development. Experienced in presenting and selling to senior
level(CEO's, CFO's, etc) decision makers in various types of verticals including technology, healthcare, entertainment, logistics, retail chains,
hospitality, etc.

contractors, etc.
